name: a light in the dark, flickering
name_original: a light in the dark, flickering
description:
play as a group from Above trying to make a settlement Below, trying to balance the amount of light production your settlement has as to both avoid being consumed by the darkness and attracting unwanted attention from the strange creatures around you

a game by alion8me and YourLordBagel
